fr.sii.ogham.email.sendgrid.v2.sender.impl.sendgrid.handler

Class PriorizedContentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.email.sendgrid.v2.sender.impl.sendgrid.handler.PriorizedContentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SendGridContentHandler

    public final class PriorizedContentHandler
extends Object
implements SendGridContentHandler
    Implementation of SendGridContentHandler that delegates content handling to specialized instances, if one matching the actual content has been declared.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PriorizedContentHandler()
      Initialize with an empty list
      PriorizedContentHandler(List<PriorizedMatchingHandler<SendGridContentHandler>> matchingHandlers)
      Initialize with the list of content handlers with matching predicate and priority.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PriorizedContentHandler

        public PriorizedContentHandler(List<PriorizedMatchingHandler<SendGridContentHandler>> matchingHandlers)
        Initialize with the list of content handlers with matching predicate and priority. Higher priority means that handler will be used first.
        Parameters:
        matchingHandlers - the list of content handlers with the associated content matcher and priority

      • PriorizedContentHandler

        public PriorizedContentHandler()
        Initialize with an empty list

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(Predicate<Content> contentMatcher,
                     SendGridContentHandler handler,
                     int priority)
        Register a new content handler using the provided content matcher.
        Parameters:
        contentMatcher - the class of the content to match
        handler - the content handler to use if the class matches
        priority - the priority order (means that matching handler with higher priority is used)

      • register

        public void register(Predicate<Content> contentMatcher,
                     SendGridContentHandler handler)
        Register a new content handler using the provided content matcher. The priority is the registration order (first registered has higher priority).
        Parameters:
        contentMatcher - the class of the content
        handler - the content handler

      • register

        public void register(Class<? extends Content> clazz,
                     SendGridContentHandler handler,
                     int priority)
        Register a new content handler. The matching predicate is only based on the class. It means that if the class of the content is a sub-class of clazz parameter, then the associated handler is used.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the content to match
        handler - the content handler to use if the class matches
        priority - the priority order (means that matching handler with higher priority is used)

      • register

        public void register(Class<? extends Content> clazz,
                     SendGridContentHandler handler)
        Register a new content handler. The matching predicate is only based on the class. It means that if the class of the content is a sub-class of clazz parameter, then the associated handler is used. The priority is the registration order (first registered has higher priority).
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the content
        handler - the content handler

      • setContent

        public void setContent(Email original,
                       com.sendgrid.SendGrid.Email email,
                       Content content)
                throws ContentHandlerException
        Description copied from interface: SendGridContentHandler
        Reads the content and adds it into the email. This method is expected to update the content of the email parameter.
        Specified by:
        setContent in interface SendGridContentHandler
        Parameters:
        original - the original Ogham email
        email - the email to put the content in
        content - the unprocessed content
        Throws:
        ContentHandlerException - the handler is unable to add the content to the email
